TopicTitle: Convert Random Letters to a Sentence!

Articles.Content:
Vain emus point wet bedsheets towards Uranus's diameter.

ioewurerer

Indecently overexposed elitist woefully ushered ragdolls everywhere rather elegantly. Right?

kshrtjse

I only ever wore underwear, remembering exhibitionism reveals extreme raves.

myotlnnn

Uh oh Ninja'd! I don't know what to do in this scenario

You could just keep your sentence there for the lols, and edit in a new sentence for the person that ninjad you, essentially continuing the game ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) I'll continue if nobody minds

"Martin, you overthrew the landlord?" "No. Not now."

pbofhzzi

"Pizza boy!" Olaf followed, "have zippy-zippy incarcerated!"

keyetrs

Kenny eats yams, even to rate Steve!

rkdfs

Random knowledge determines funny sentences.

hfdrepopt

Hate farting? Dr. Repper eagerly prescribes obscene proton torpedoes.

uahefndn

typo

Ukraine aristocrats, hiding everyone's favourite neanderthal: Dusty Nick!

pwuideah

"Perhaps," Wu uttered, "I die every afternoon? Hmm."

ldhdte

Leisurly, Deirdre handed documents to Eugene.

kfentghr

Kaptain Farthing, each night, tackles greasy, hedonistic rats.

iroehdh

Iron rails omitted eager hadron destroying harpsichords.

uraqtjk

Uru rides a quacking truck, just kidding.

Mwaabfb!

My wallaby ate a big fat bug!

eiuory

Eleventh immigrant uttered: "Only revenge, Yuri."

khaedtui

Killing, hate and eavesdropping do terrible underestimated injures.

SIWIPRLM

Sorry, I Want Intermediate Possums Rolling Lightly Meteor.

SSARSSADG

Souper Sorry Armadillos Reach Sarcastically Salad After Diving Gary 

SAZXYD

SO ANGELO ZARKS YUCKS DIAMONDS?

todhs

Today oranges died having sugar.

Boacbbu

Bob, open all cubboards by bedtime.... um....

trtart
